metadata.title: CVE-2019-19916 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Midori Browser 0.5.11 (on Windows 10), Content Security Policy (CSP) isnot applied correctly to all parts of multipart content sent with themultipart/x-mixed-replace MIME type. This could result in script runningwhere CSP should have blocked it, allowing for cross-site scripting (XSS)and other attacks when the product renders the content as HTML. Remediatingthis would also need to consider the polyglot case, e.g., a file that is avalid GIF image and also valid JavaScript.

criterions.comment: midori package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
